Philippines' Marcos says he remains firm in defending sovereigntyPhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr said in an address to the Australian parliament on Thursday he would not allow any foreign power to taken "even one square inch" of the country's territory, and that Manila remained firm in defending its sovereignty. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 00:12:24 GMT 5HKEJFP37VKJ7H2JDB4SL63RUE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-marcos-says-he-remains-firm-defending-sovereignty-2024-02-29/Reuters世界亚太地区
Britain seeks 'urgent reversal' of fall in childhood vaccination ratesBritain will on Thursday launch a drive to boost childhood vaccination rates, health authorities said, seeking an "urgent reversal" to a fall in uptake as the country faces a worsening measles outbreak. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 00:07:53 GMT ZP3XH24Y4BK6LDLC5OHS5KPG7U https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britain-seeks-urgent-reversal-fall-childhood-vaccination-rates-2024-02-29/Reuters世界英国
US considers airdropping aid into Gaza as land deliveries slow, US official saysPresident Joe Biden's administration is considering airdropping aid from U.S. military planes into Gaza as land deliveries become increasingly difficult, a U.S. official said on Wednesday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 00:00:37 GMT QKVJOQUKHBOK5CWT2HJOGADWNM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-considers-airdropping-aid-into-gaza-land-deliveries-slow-us-official-says-2024-02-29/Steve Holland, Kanishka Singh世界中东
China willing to enhance economic, trade cooperation with Egypt, commerce minister saysChina is willing to further promote economic and trade cooperation with Egypt, and to continue to encourage and support its enterprises to invest and start businesses in the African country, the Chinese commerce ministry cited its minister as saying. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 23:34:00 GMT NBVZFTVZJBMC3P5LSYHFZQ6HQU https://www.reuters.com/world/china-willing-enhance-economic-trade-cooperation-with-egypt-commerce-minister-2024-02-28/Reuters世界
Canada will reinstate some visa requirements for Mexicans, says CBCCanada will reinstate some visa requirements for Mexican nationals on Thursday in a bid to curb the flow of asylum seekers, the Canadian Broadcasting Corp said, citing a senior official. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 22:34:19 GMT NQWCPUIWMZKUHP7SPOIPXI7RUE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-will-reinstate-some-visa-requirements-mexicans-says-cbc-2024-02-28/Reuters世界美洲
Police from US, Mexico, Guatemala to collaborate on border securityThe United States, Mexico and Guatemala will create a trilateral working group focused on security, law enforcement and border infrastructure, the three nations said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 22:16:04 GMT 6RS5FFQ7DFIW5N2IZQ4KIORU5Q https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/police-us-mexico-guatemala-collaborate-border-security-2024-02-28/Reuters世界美洲
Canada fired two scientists for sharing information with Beijing, says paperCanada fired two scientists working at a high-security infectious disease laboratory in 2021 because they provided confidential information to China, the Globe and Mail newspaper reported on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 22:11:55 GMT JU7TP3OTZRL7NFYE2QSWPURVA4 https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-fired-two-scientists-sharing-information-with-beijing-says-paper-2024-02-28/Reuters世界
US Supreme Court to decide Trump criminal immunity claim in 2020 election caseThe U.S. Supreme Court on Wednesday agreed to decide Donald Trump's claim of immunity from prosecution for trying to overturn his 2020 election loss, giving him a boost as he tries to delay criminal prosecutions while running to regain the presidency. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 22:07:47 GMT BQUBO5NWAJLXHHCFB4WUHFMPX4 https://www.reuters.com/legal/us-supreme-court-decide-trump-criminal-immunity-claim-2020-election-case-2024-02-28/John Kruzel, Andrew Chung合法的政府
US sentences Florida resident for smuggling guns to Haiti gang, embassy saysA U.S. court has sentenced a Florida resident to five years in prison for participating in a "sophisticated smuggling scheme" trafficking arms and ammunition to Haiti's powerful 400 Mawozo gang, the U.S. embassy in Haiti said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 22:04:47 GMT TDMJ3OY7ERLHJAYHWZFR25QSFI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-sentences-florida-resident-smuggling-guns-haiti-gang-embassy-says-2024-02-28/Reuters世界
Halkbank urges immunity from US prosecution in Iran sanctions caseTurkey's Halkbank drew skepticism from a U.S. appeals court panel on Wednesday, as the state-owned lender renewed its push to escape U.S. criminal charges that it helped Iran evade American sanctions. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 21:57:11 GMT EXCTXQD46ROXPJH736PQDPWCJU https://www.reuters.com/legal/halkbank-urges-immunity-us-prosecution-iran-sanctions-case-2024-02-28/Jonathan Stempel合法的诉讼
Five suspects in Ecuador presidential candidate killing to go on trial, attorney general saysFive suspects accused of involvement in the assassination of Ecuadorean anti-corruption presidential candidate Fernando Villavicencio, who was gunned down in Quito last August, will go to trial, the attorney general's office said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 21:49:19 GMT ARG3LVOHWBOHZEH3FA6BAKLHXI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ Five-suspects-ecuador-candidate-killing-will-go-审判-检察官-2024-02-28/Alexandra Valencia世界美洲
